Text: This is the first episode of season 5 by the way.

You two are idots...and apparently you don't mind flaunting it. 

Unlike the two of you, I do research before commenting. 

S04E20 at 16:58 "Welcome back to the closing ceremonies, this is our last episode of the SUMMER and it could not have come soon enough" ... "Keep up with our blog it will constantly be updated during the BREAK". At 20:50 "See you in Autumn, jerks".

S04E21 at 00:35 "We have returned. Welcome to Tosh.0 it's been exhilarating 57 days without you, but all good things must come to an end (referring to the 57 day mid-season break). This Fall the wardrobe will be overpriced concert Tees".

There are many shows that take extended mid-season breaks and continue/resume many days, weeks, and sometimes months later.  A "Season" is whatever the show's contract says a season is (30 episodes for season 4) and does not necessarily start and stop (coincide) with the four, weather, seasons of the year. THIS IS A CONTINUATION OF SEASON FOUR!!!

TVGuide & ZAP2it are the two top authorities in tv show listings and they both list the show as continuing after a mid-season, summer, break...as do every other mainstream authority in the industry...INCLUDING THE TOSH.0 BLOG
